purpleculture_pinyin:
xī
in all cases; know
во всех случаях; знать
rtega_mnemonic:
悉悉RSknow, learn about, comprehend
  • RS. to sort out 釆 the heart (mind) 心: know
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 釆 indicates the sound; 心 (mind) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
熟悉 [ shú xī ]: to be familiar with; to know well
据悉 [ jù xī ]: according to reports; it is reported (that)
获悉 [ huò xī ]: to learn of sth; to find out; to get news
悉数 [ xī shù ]: all; every single one; the entire sum
悉心 [ xī xīn ]: to put one's heart (and soul) into sth; with great care
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 釆 [ biàn ] to distinguish; to pick, to gather, to collect
    • 心 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
heisig_chinese_memo: Polar bears are endangered and scientists are trying to keep track of the ones remaining. Their hearts beat fast as they hurry to search for polar bear droppings and they want to be informed of any information which can help the search.
Ru_trainchinese: xī: (графема) узнать подробности, ознакомиться; целиком, полностью; (книжн.) подробный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a heart (心) and topped rice (釆) are everything
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Polar bears are endangered and scientists are trying to keep track of the ones remaining. Their hearts beat fast as they hurry to search for polar bear droppings and they want to be informed of any information which can help the search.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " heart ", from "釆", the original meaning is detailed. "Said the text": "It is also detailed. From the heart to the 釆. 𢝕, the ancient text is known." "Historical Records-Zhang Shizhi Feng Tang Biography": "The tiger circle and the husband, from the next generation lieutenant to the animal book asked by the superior. "

The detailed meaning can be extended to complete, all, and complete. "Eastern View of the Han Dynasty-Guangwu Ji": "In the spring and February of the sixth year, the Wu Han went to Pengcheng, and the world was determined."

" Note " can also be extended to understand. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·The Biography of Cool Officials·Zhou Hao": "Naomi asked the gatekeeper: "Who knows who has entered the city?"" Li Xian's note: "I know, I still know."
humanum_short_description_en: From " heart ", from "釆", the original meaning is detailed.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，從「釆」，本義為詳盡。《說文》：「詳盡也。从心从釆。𢝕，古文悉。」 《史記‧張釋之馮唐列傳》：「虎圈嗇夫，從旁代尉對上所問禽獸簿甚悉。」

　　由詳盡義可引申為盡、皆、全。《東觀漢記‧光武紀》：「六年春二月，吳漢下胊城，天下悉定。」

　　「悉」也可引申為了解。《後漢書‧酷吏傳‧周紆》：「乃密問守門人曰：『悉誰載槁入城者？』」李賢注：「悉，猶知也。」

從「 心 」，從「 釆 」，本義為詳盡。《說文》：「詳盡也。从心从釆。𢝕，古文悉。」 《史記‧張釋之馮唐列傳》：「虎圈嗇夫，從旁代尉對上所問禽獸簿甚悉。」 由詳盡義可引申為盡、皆、全。《東觀漢記‧光武紀》：「六年春二月，吳漢下胊城，天下悉定。」 「 悉 」也可引申為了解。《後漢書‧酷吏傳‧周紆》：「乃密問守門人曰：『悉誰載槁入城者？』」李賢注：「悉，猶知也。」
From " heart", from " 釆", the original meaning is detailed. "Said the text": "It is also detailed. From the heart to the 釆. 𢝕, the ancient text is known." "Historical Records-Zhang Shizhi Feng Tang Biography": "The tiger circle and the husband, from the next generation lieutenant to the animal book asked by the superior. " The detailed meaning can be extended to complete, all, and complete. "Eastern View of the Han Dynasty-Guangwu Ji": "In the spring and February of the sixth year, the Wu Han went to Pengcheng, and the world was determined." " Note" can also be extended to understand. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·The Biography of Cool Officials·Zhou Hao": "Naomi asked the gatekeeper: "Who knows who has entered the city?"" Li Xian's note: "I know, I still know."

悉字的基本解释

悉
xī
知道：洞悉（很清楚地知道）。尽悉。获悉。来函敬悉。
尽，全：悉力。悉心。悉数（sh?）。悉数（sh?）（完全列举，如“不可悉悉”）。

悉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》息七切，入質，心。］
(1)尽、全。
(2)尽其所有。
(3)详尽。
(4)知道，了解。
(5)伸。
(6)姓。参见“悉諸”。

悉字的英文翻译

◎ 悉
all, entirely, know, learn

悉字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　悉； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页386第32
〔古文〕??怸【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?息七切，音膝。詳盡也，諳究也。知也。　又姓。　【六書總要】从心釆，會意。釆，古辨字。取明析之義。與采字不同。

悉字的源字形

悉字的起名意思

1、知道;尽，全，详尽。

1. Know; exhaustive, complete, detailed.
(缺)
悉 X
字的上部是野兽的足迹(“采”,
参见“番”字条);下部是“心”。表示
心里很清楚当前的情况。本义是“详
尽也”(《说文》)。如“知悉”、“洞悉”、
“获悉”等。又有“尽”、“全都”义。

精

简化学
之悉
要
(недостаток)
Xi X
Верхняя часть слова - это след дикого зверя («Цай», см. Примечание «Веер»), нижняя часть - «Синь».
Указывает, что текущая ситуация очень ясна.
Первоначальное значение - «исчерпывающий» («Шуовэнь»).
Такие как «знание», «понимание», «обучение» и так далее.
Он также имеет значение «полный» и «все».
